page.title: 20SCHOOL CROSS-COUNTRY
page.content: {Ashton Park}School cross-country race took place round{Ashton Court}in April.It started and finished on the school field .{67}first year boys took part in the event.In first place was{Philip Reid, 2nd Dylan Barrett } and in{3rd place}was{Mark Dudbridge. The first three people got certificates and the first person also got a shield .The track was up into the cowfield,round the{Ashton Court} {Mansion}and then back round across the {Ha Ha}and into the field. Then down hill into the school field. The teachers gave you a ticket to show the position you came .Other years had different routes on the same day.Both boys and girls took part.{Cotswold {House }won both the boys and girls races with{Quantock }and {Mendip} Houses 2nd and 3rd.in the first year.
